content: Identifier for a time offset from UTC of +8This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "UTC+08:00" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(March 2014)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **UTC+08:00** is an identifier for a [time offset from UTC](/wiki/UTC_offset) of +08:00. It is the most populous [time zone](/wiki/Time_zone) in the world, as well as a possible candidate for [ASEAN Common Time](/wiki/ASEAN_Common_Time), mainly due to China's large population, with an estimated population of 1.4 billion people. This time zone is used in all predominantly [Chinese-speaking regions](/wiki/Chinese-speaking_world), giving international Chinese websites and TV channels the same time. In Indonesia, it is known as **Central Indonesian Time** ([Indonesian](/wiki/Indonesian_language): *Waktu Indonesia Tengah / WITA*) while in Western Australia, it is known as **Australian Western Standard Time**. ## As standard time (year-round) Principal cities: [Irkutsk](/wiki/Irkutsk), [Ulaanbaatar](/wiki/Ulaanbaatar), [Shanghai](/wiki/Shanghai), [Beijing](/wiki/Beijing), [Guangzhou](/wiki/Guangzhou), [Hangzhou](/wiki/Hangzhou), [Suzhou](/wiki/Suzhou,_Jiangsu), [Xiamen](/wiki/Xiamen), [Shenzhen](/wiki/Shenzhen), [Hong Kong](/wiki/Hong_Kong), [Macau](/wiki/Macau), [Taipei](/wiki/Taipei), [Taichung](/wiki/Taichung), [Kaohsiung](/wiki/Kaohsiung), [Kuala Lumpur](/wiki/Kuala_Lumpur), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), [Bandar Seri Begawan](/wiki/Bandar_Seri_Begawan), [Manila](/wiki/Manila), [Quezon City](/wiki/Quezon_City), [Tanjung Selor](/wiki/Tanjung_Selor), [Balikpapan](/wiki/Balikpapan), [Samarinda](/wiki/Samarinda), [Manado](/wiki/Manado), [Palu](/wiki/Palu), [Makassar](/wiki/Makassar), [Denpasar](/wiki/Denpasar), [Kupang](/wiki/Kupang), [Perth](/wiki/Perth). ### North Asia - Russia – [Irkutsk Time](/wiki/Irkutsk_Time) - [Far Eastern Federal District](/wiki/Far_Eastern_Federal_District) - [Buryatia](/wiki/Buryatia) - [Siberian Federal District](/wiki/Siberian_Federal_District) - [Irkutsk Oblast](/wiki/Irkutsk_Oblast) ### East Asia - Mongolia – [Time in Mongolia](/wiki/Time_in_Mongolia) - Eastern part, including [Dornod](/wiki/Dornod_Province), [Sükhbaatar](/wiki/S%C3%BCkhbaatar_Province), [Ulaanbaatar](/wiki/Ulaanbaatar) - Mainland China – [China Standard Time](/wiki/Time_in_China) - Hong Kong – [Hong Kong Time](/wiki/Hong_Kong_Time) (Hong Kong Standard Time) - Macau – [Macau Time](/wiki/Macau_Standard_Time) (Macau Standard Time) - Taiwan – [National Standard Time](/wiki/Time_in_Taiwan) ### Southeast Asia - Brunei – [Brunei Darussalam Standard Time](/wiki/Time_in_Brunei) - Indonesia – [Central Indonesia Time](/wiki/Time_in_Indonesia) - Parts of [Kalimantan](/wiki/Kalimantan): - [East Kalimantan](/wiki/East_Kalimantan) - [North Kalimantan](/wiki/North_Kalimantan) - [South Kalimantan](/wiki/South_Kalimantan) - [Lesser Sunda Islands](/wiki/Lesser_Sunda_Islands) - [Bali](/wiki/Bali) - [East Nusa Tenggara](/wiki/East_Nusa_Tenggara) - [West Nusa Tenggara](/wiki/West_Nusa_Tenggara) - All provinces in [Sulawesi](/wiki/Sulawesi) - [Central Sulawesi](/wiki/Central_Sulawesi) - [Gorontalo](/wiki/Gorontalo) - [North Sulawesi](/wiki/North_Sulawesi) - [South Sulawesi](/wiki/South_Sulawesi) - [Southeast Sulawesi](/wiki/Southeast_Sulawesi) - [West Sulawesi](/wiki/West_Sulawesi) - Malaysia – [Malaysia Standard Time](/wiki/Time_in_Malaysia) - Philippines – [Philippine Standard Time](/wiki/Philippine_Standard_Time) - Singapore – [Singapore Standard Time](/wiki/Singapore_Standard_Time) ### Oceania - Australia - [Western Australia](/wiki/Western_Australia) (except [Eucla](/wiki/Eucla,_Western_Australia) and nearby areas, including [Caiguna](/wiki/Caiguna), [Cocklebiddy](/wiki/Cocklebiddy), [Madura](/wiki/Madura,_Western_Australia) and [Mundrabilla](/wiki/Mundrabilla,_Western_Australia), unofficially observes UTC+08:45) ### Antarctica #### Southern Ocean - Some bases in [Antarctica](/wiki/Antarctica). See also [Time in Antarctica](/wiki/Time_in_Antarctica). - Australia - [Casey Station](/wiki/Casey_Station) ## Discrepancies between official UTC+08:00 and geographical UTC+08:00 This section is only partly updated for longitudes using other time zones. This concerns areas within 112°30′ E to 127°30′ E longitude. - Parts of Russia, including very easternmost parts of [Krasnoyarsk Krai](/wiki/Krasnoyarsk_Krai), where UTC+07:00 is used, and [Zabaykalsky Krai](/wiki/Zabaykalsky_Krai) and most of western [Sakha Republic](/wiki/Sakha_Republic) where UTC+09:00 is used. - Parts of Indonesia, including eastern [East Java](/wiki/East_Java) with its capital city [Surabaya](/wiki/Surabaya), most of [Central Kalimantan](/wiki/Central_Kalimantan) with its capital city [Palangka Raya](/wiki/Palangka_Raya), and eastern part of [West Kalimantan](/wiki/West_Kalimantan), where UTC+07:00 is used, and some of the western islands in the province of [Maluku](/wiki/Maluku_(province)) and [North Maluku](/wiki/North_Maluku) where UTC+09:00 is used. - East Timor, where UTC+09:00 is used. - Parts of [Okinawa Prefecture](/wiki/Okinawa_Prefecture), Japan, including [Sakishima Islands](/wiki/Sakishima_Islands) with its westernmost point [Yonaguni](/wiki/Yonaguni), western parts of [Kerama Islands](/wiki/Kerama_Islands), and some islands of the western [Okinawa Islands](/wiki/Okinawa_Islands), where UTC+09:00 is used. - The western parts of [Korea](/wiki/Korea), including the North Korean capital city, [Pyongyang](/wiki/Pyongyang) and South Korean capital city, [Seoul](/wiki/Seoul), where UTC+09:00 is used. ### Areas outside UTC+08:00 longitudes using UTC+08:00 time #### Areas between 127°30′ E and 142°30′ E ("physical" UTC+09:00) - Parts of [northeast China](/wiki/Northeast_China) including the eastern half of [Heilongjiang](/wiki/Heilongjiang) Province and the [Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture](/wiki/Yanbian_Korean_Autonomous_Prefecture) in [Jilin](/wiki/Jilin) Province. - Easternmost parts of Western Australia. #### Areas between 97°30′ E and 112°30′ E ("physical" UTC+07:00) - Singapore - Malaysia: - Western part of [Sarawak](/wiki/Sarawak) in [Malaysian Borneo](/wiki/Malaysian_Borneo). - [Peninsular Malaysia](/wiki/Peninsular_Malaysia), where the nation's capital Kuala Lumpur is located. - Many parts of central China including: - [Hainan](/wiki/Hainan) - [Guangxi](/wiki/Guangxi) - [Yunnan](/wiki/Yunnan) - [Guizhou](/wiki/Guizhou) - [Sichuan](/wiki/Sichuan) - [Chongqing](/wiki/Chongqing) - [Shaanxi](/wiki/Shaanxi) - [Ningxia](/wiki/Ningxia) - [Gansu](/wiki/Gansu) - Western two-third of [Hunan](/wiki/Hunan) - Western half of: - [Hubei](/wiki/Hubei) - [Shanxi](/wiki/Shanxi) - [Inner Mongolia](/wiki/Inner_Mongolia), including its capital [Hohhot](/wiki/Hohhot). - western third of: - [Guangdong](/wiki/Guangdong) - [Henan](/wiki/Henan) - Most of central Mongolia including the capital [Ulaanbaatar](/wiki/Ulaanbaatar). - In Russia, most of: - [Irkutsk Oblast](/wiki/Irkutsk_Oblast) - [Buryatia](/wiki/Buryatia) #### Areas between 82°30′ E and 97°30′ E ("physical" UTC+06:00) - Parts of China - Most of [Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region](/wiki/Xinjiang_Uyghur_Autonomous_Region) (although many locals set their clocks at UTC+06:00 even if it is officially UTC+08:00, in any case work and shop schedules are two hours after Shanghai and Beijing). See also [Time in China](/wiki/Time_in_China). - most of [Tibet Autonomous Region](/wiki/Tibet_Autonomous_Region) - Western Mongolia. #### Areas between 67°30′ E and 82°30′ E ("physical" UTC+05:00) - Parts of western China including western Xinjiang province ([Kashgar](/wiki/Kashgar)) (although most locals observe UTC+06:00 even if it is officially UTC+08:00). ## Historical time offsets The southern half of Vietnam ([Republic of Vietnam](/wiki/Republic_of_Vietnam)) was formerly part of this time zone prior to the national reunification on 30 April 1975, making it one hour ahead of [North Vietnam](/wiki/North_Vietnam). After 1975, the whole country came under the North Vietnamese time zone, UTC+07:00. According to Presidential Decree 41/1987, Indonesia's ex-province of Timor Timur used this time zone with neighboring East Nusa Tenggara and other provinces in Lesser Sunda Islands, parts of Kalimantan and Sulawesi until independence as [East Timor](/wiki/East_Timor), which the country changed to UTC+09:00 as the official time zone. - [Time in China](/wiki/Time_in_China) - [Time in Australia](/wiki/Time_in_Australia) - [Time in Cambodia](/wiki/Time_in_Cambodia) - [Time in Laos](/wiki/Time_in_Laos) - [Time in Russia](/wiki/Time_in_Russia) - [Time in Vietnam](/wiki/Time_in_Vietnam) - [Xinjiang Time](/wiki/Xinjiang_Time) - Media related to UTC+08:00 at Wikimedia Commons - History of Hong Kong Time Service Archived 2009-05-22 at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine)
